name: A Hole In My Soul
description:
Welcome to A Hole In My Soul!

A Game Created for the Brakeys 2020.1 Game Jam

The aim is to repair the holes aroud the map. (repair all 100 to win)

The red holes give you special abilites, use these to complete platforming puzzles.

CONTROLS:
  • A/D to move left/right
  • W/Space to jump
  • H To show controls
  • I to restart the level
  • Left shift to spawn a block
  • E to teleport to nearest totem with line of sight
  • R to spawn recall point and to recall to that point
